title: # 529 - Whitney Cummings, Georgia Kreischer & ME
itunes:title: # 529 - Whitney Cummings, Georgia Kreischer & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with my daughter Georgia and comedian, Whitney Cummings. Originally, Whitney and I were going to podcast and a few minuted in, Georgia walks in on us and sits down for the rest of the podcast and Whitney interviews her. Later on, Georgias 2 friends and LeeAnn come in and we all hang and chat. You don’t want to miss this one! 

 

Whitney has a new special “Jokes” available on Netflix now! 

 

Follow Whitney 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/whitneycummings 

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/whitneycummings 

 

This episode is brought to you by Helix. Get up to $200 off all mattress orders and 2 free pillows at http://www.helixsleep.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Freeze Pipe. Get 10% off with the code “BERT” at http://www.thefreezepipe.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Shady Rays. Use the code “BERT” for 50% off 2+ pairs of polarized sunglasses at http://www.shadyrays.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Dad Grass. Get 20% off your first order at http://www.dadgrass.com/bert 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
